Verse - Class in com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.basic
A base class for simplest complete unit of data in this library.
Verse(Reference) - Constructor for class com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.basic.Verse
Any Reference can be used to create a Verse, but only the first verse in that Reference will be used by this Verse.
